snippet: Six years after he lost his right leg in Iraq, Thomas Lee Jr. achieved his goal for the New York City Triathlon: not quitting.
abstract: Thomas Lee Jr achieves his goal of completing 13th annual New York City Triathlon, six years after losing his right leg in Iraq.
lead_paragraph: Six years after he lost his right leg in Iraq, Thomas Lee Jr. achieved his goal for the New York City Triathlon: not quitting.

headline.main: In New York City Triathlon, No Quit or Excuses for Iraq War Veteran
headline.print_headline: No Quit Or Excuses For Veteran Of Iraq War
